Topic: Tanla Q3 profit jumps multi-folds to Rs 93.5 cr
Statement:
New Delhi^ Feb 6 (PTI) Cloud communication technology firm Tanla Platforms on Saturday posted multi-fold jump in consolidated net profit to Rs 93.5 crore for the quarter ended on December 31^ 2020.
